hero.title: Your Privacy, Our Priority
hero.subtitle: SafeVoice is built from the ground up for privacy. Learn how we protect your identity and data, and how you can maximize your privacy with our tools.

features.anonymousDesc: No real name, email, or phone number needed
features.encryptedDesc: AES-256 encryption for your local data

features.title: Privacy Features
features.subtitle: Built-in protections that keep you anonymous by default
features.encryptionDesc: Your data is encrypted locally before storage
features.analyticsDesc: No tracking scripts, no user profiling

dataFlow.title: How Your Data Flows
dataFlow.subtitle: Your data journey from creation to storage

steps.youDesc: Your device - where all data starts
steps.noServerDesc: Data stays on your device by default

dataFlow.defaultContent: Data encrypted locally, Stored on your device, No transmission anywhere, Maximum privacy
dataFlow.optionalContent: Backup to IPFS network, Decentralized storage, No identity link, Still anonymous

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.tip: Tip: Use the search bar to find answers to specific questions, or browse by category to learn about a particular privacy topic.

cta.title: Ready to Protect Your Privacy?
cta.subtitle: Take the next step with SafeVoice. Whether you're just starting out or looking to enhance your privacy, we have options for every comfort level.
cta.contributeDesc: Share your thoughts anonymously with the community
cta.customizeDesc: Fine-tune your privacy settings and protections
